Translations.Text: Win ib$an taeemmaqt, Nezzazzal as degs, i £ ihwan, i win i £ Neb$a. Sinna, Nerra yas Loahennama ad din io$, indell, ippuveggeo
Win ib$an laxeot, iaazem fellas yal laazem, u neppa iumen; widak, tajmilt i laazem nnsen
I akw, i wigi d wiyav, Nwessaa tikci s$uo Mass ik. Tikci n Mass ik, ur meedudet
Wali amek Nesmenyaf kra i wiyav. War ccekk, di laxeot, lfeoq d usmenyef, ad ilin sennig waya
Ur sau, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven, mulac a ppu$alev d imdelli, d imveggaa
Iseyya d Mass ik: ur taabdem siwa Neppa, elhut ar imawlan. Ma, $uoek wesser yiwen, ne$ ma wessren i sin, ur asen qqao: "ttfuh"! Ur ten ppara. Mmeslay asen s lkyasa
Zger fellasen tacvat n lmaenana. Ini: "a Mass iw! Eun fellasen, akken iyi d ssekren d amejtue
Mass nnwen Yif akw akken Issen, i illan deg iman nnwen. Ma telham, Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie wid isteooiaen
Efk i llezm ik amur is, akw i ume$bun akked win d ibbwi ubrid. Ur pjeggie d ajeggee
Ijeggaeen, s tidep, d atmaten n Cciian. Cciian ijhel ar Mass is
